content: Empire State Building's lights got me hyped. NYC's energy is infectious, and I'm ready to dive back into the hustle. Time to kickstart my career again, but this time, with a sharper focus.
raw_content: The energy of NYC is back in my veins. Just saw the Empire State Building lit up, and it's like a beacon calling me back to the grind. Time to restart my career, this time with a clearer vision.

content: So, turned 22 today. Last year feels like a blur, but now I'm back with a plan. Took some advice from a mentor and started on my own trading model. Here's to growing and starting fresh!

content: Had coffee with an old trading buddy. We dove into the ethical side of high-frequency trading. Left with a brain full of questions. this stuff keeps you up thinking, ngl.
raw_content: Had an insightful coffee meeting with an old trading buddy. Discussed the ethical implications of high-frequency trading. Left with more questions than answers, but it's the kind of puzzle that keeps you up at night.

content: Been grinding on this market analysis for weeks, and finally, the patterns are showing up. It's like discovering the beat in all that trading noise. Might just be my ticket to beating those benchmarks.
raw_content: The market analysis I've been working on for weeks is finally showing patterns I can use. It's like finding a hidden melody in the cacophony of the trading floor. Maybe this is the key to outperforming benchmarks.

content: Just wrapped up some coding. Got the bare bones of my trading algo done. Now, let's see if it can actually make some cash . The thrill is real, but so are the nerves.

content: just met a quant trader at this networking thing and now he's my mentor. we talked about market vibes and how blockchain might shake things up. kinda mind-blowing tbh, but also a bit intimidating.
